name: Lena Schneider
description: Experienced German tutor specializing in business German and advanced conversation skills. Offers personalized lessons and flexible scheduling.

name: Markus Bauer
description: Friendly tutor with a passion for teaching German to beginners and intermediate students. Utilizes engaging methods to make learning enjoyable.

name: Sophie Fischer
description: Skilled German tutor with a focus on advanced grammar and literature. Offers both in-person and online lessons.

name: Johann Weber
description: Versatile tutor available for all levels of German learners. Specializes in exam preparation and conversational practice.

name: Clara Müller
description: Experienced tutor offering lessons for intermediate to advanced learners, with a focus on business German and professional communication.

name: Emma Klein
description: Patient and engaging tutor for beginners and intermediate students. Offers interactive lessons to help students build confidence in speaking German.
